title: Development of exploration and trade 16th cent

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Explain how advances in learning and technology influenced fifteenth- and sixteenth- century European exploration and trade.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Explain how advances in learning and technology influenced fifteenth- and sixteenth- century European exploration and trade.

topic.text: 1.6: Technological Advances and the Age of Exploration

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
